ALTW 2004

8 December, Macquarie University

The Australasian Language Technology Workshop is being organised by ALTA, the Australasian Language Technology Association.

The workshop will be co-llocated with the Australasian Language Technology Summer School (ALTSS 2004) and the Australian International Conference on Speech Science & Technology (SST 2004).

Note:

  • VENUE: The workshop will be at the Macquarie Graduate School of Management Conference Centre. On the day of the workshop, please pick up your badge and workshop proceedings at the SST conference registration desk at the conference center
  • The dinner that is mentioned on the registration page is an SST dinner, not an ALTA dinner. Of course, you are welcome to attend that if you wish. An ALTA dinner is currently being planned.
  • Camera-Ready versions are due by the 1st of November 2004. Please see the updated formatting instructions.

What's New

17/09/04 Registration open - early bird registration deadline 31 October
